data.name: BUNNY-HOP
data.detailed_description:
https://discord.com/invite/ZPcyuQTfPM


Forget about Speedlimits!

BUNNY-HOP is a skill-based 3D-Platformer. Hop through the levels with imense speed, overcome dynamic obstacles or just enjoy the view. Every parkour has its own unique style and complexity, each with a twist of their own.
Measure your time and compete against other players in a lobby or globally on a leaderboard. Besides the well known Timer-Gamemode, BUNNY-HOP also offers additional gamemodes such as the Racing-Gamemode and many more to come. Built with Unreal Engine 4, BUNNY-HOP supports a variety of cutting edge rendering technologies (NVIDIA Ray-Tracing, DLSS v2, NVIDIA Direct Illumination, etc.) to make the game stand out and help its artstyle shine.
Discord


  • Blazing fast gameplay
  • Stunning worlds with each having its own style and complexity
  • Aww you are loosing speed? ROCKET PUNCH!
  • Ray-Tracing, DLSS and NVIDIA Direct Illumination
  • Compete against other players
  • Customize your Agent
  • NO STOPPING!

data.short_description: Forget about Speedlimits! BUNNY-HOP is a skill-based 3D-Platformer. Hop through the levels with imense speed, overcome dynamic obstacles or just enjoy the view. Every parkour has its own unique style and complexity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1000 Series or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with DirectX 11 Support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Who uses Sound cards anymore?
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with DirectX 12 Support
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Who uses Sound cards anymore?
